ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE RALPH GOODALE, P.C., of Regina, Saskatchewan, as Special Advisor to the Prime Minister, to be known as Special Advisor for the Government of Canada's ongoing response to the Ukraine International Airlines flight PS752 tragedy, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis.
